name: Hidden Office
description:
Office is empty now... Except cats. There are 12 rooms with plenty items. Find everything in a checklist and have fun!

Classic Hidden Object game in 3D



Extra achivements: find all 30 cats and get animated collectible cards



12 areas (108 levels) to unlock
Plenty classic and unique challenges





Easy to use
Comfortable Zoom and Rotation
No time limit - just relax and have fun

Don't forget to
